Name: Nizam
Namesake: Sir Osman Ali Khan, The Last Nizam of Hyderabad
awards:
Battle honours:
Malta Convoys 1941–42
Crete 1941
Libya 1941
Mediterranean 1941
Indian Ocean 1942–44
Pacific 1943
Okinawa 1945
Fate: Returned to RN, not returned to service, scrapped in 1956
Displacement:
1,773 long tons (1,801 t) (standard)
2,384 long tons (2,422 t) (deep load)
Range: 5,500 nmi (10,200 km; 6,300 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
processing systems:
ASDIC
Type 285 gunnery radar
Type 286 radar surface-search radar
Armament:
3 × twin QF 4.7-inch (120 mm) Mk XII guns
1 × single QF 4-inch Mk V (102 mm) AA gun
4 × single 20 mm (0.8 in) Oerlikon AA guns
2 × twin QF 0.5-inch (12.7 mm) Mk III machineguns
1 × quintuple 21-inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes 
45 × depth charges, 1 × rack, 2 × throwers
